login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: Sign in with your email to save your scenarios to the cloud
login.checkEmail: Please check your email for the login link

dashboard.title: Financial Dashboard
dashboard.configureInputs: Please configure your financial inputs first

tooltips.irr: Internal Rate of Return; compare with WACC to decide if value is created.
tooltips.npv: Net Present Value discounting cash flows using WACC rate.
tooltips.discountRate: Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC); used for NPV and as a reference for IRR.
tooltips.ltvCac: LTV/CAC > 3 indicates a good business model.
tooltips.cac: Customer Acquisition Cost = marketing / new customers.
tooltips.ltv: Lifetime Value = revenue per customer over their lifetime.
tooltips.payback: Time to recover CAC. Ideal < 12 months.
tooltips.breakeven: Point where revenue equals total costs.
tooltips.product-units: Number of machines available for rent.
tooltips.product-pricing-mode: Choose 'daily' to price per day or 'monthly' to price per month.
tooltips.product-min-days: Minimum rental length. Default 15 days. Adjust for larger equipment if needed.
tooltips.product-variable-cost: Direct cost per rental: consumables, shipping, cleaning, etc.
tooltips.product-occupancy: Average % of time the machine is rented (0-100%).
tooltips.prescriber-commission: Share of revenue paid to the prescriber. Can be 0%.
tooltips.salary: Total annual cost per employee (gross salary + taxes).
tooltips.infra-cost: Annual infrastructure costs: warehouse, office, insurance.
tooltips.web-maint: Yearly cost to run and maintain the web/app platform.
tooltips.marketing-spend: Annual marketing & sales budget (ads, events, etc.).
tooltips.new-customers: Estimated new customers acquired each year.
tooltips.rentals-per-customer: Total rentals one customer is expected to make during their lifetime.
tooltips.churn: % of customers that stop renting each year (lower = better retention).
tooltips.growth: Annual growth rate applied to demand (units rented).
tooltips.inflation: Annual increase applied to costs (salaries, variableCost, etc.).
tooltips.discount-rate: Weighted Average Cost of Capital. Used to discount cash-flows in NPV/IRR calculations.

scenarioLab.title: Scenario Lab
scenarioLab.saveCurrentScenario: Save your current scenario to start comparing.
scenarioLab.saveScenarioDesc: Give your scenario a name to save it for future reference.
scenarioLab.shareLinkDesc: The scenario share link has been copied to your clipboard.
scenarioLab.copyFailedDesc: Failed to copy the share link to clipboard.
scenarioLab.compareScenarios: Compare up to 3 scenarios side by side
scenarioLab.selectScenarios: Select 'Compare' on scenarios to include them here.
scenarioLab.comparisonLimitDesc: You can compare up to 3 scenarios at once.

sensitivity.title: Sensitivity Analysis
sensitivity.tornadoDesc: Impact on EBITDA when varying each parameter ±10%
sensitivity.monteCarloDesc: EBITDA probability distribution based on 1,000 simulations
